PathOfBuilding.Notes:
la plupart du degen passe sur la life et mana a cause de : + 50% dmg bypasse es (timless jewel) pour le es degen
minions have added fire damage with combustion which can ignite and proc -19% fire res
sceptre has added lightning/cold damage which procs EE
